name: Resource Wagon
tag_list: human-resources, information-technology, on-boarding, applicant-tracking, provisioning, resource-tracking
overview:
Resource Wagon is SaaS focused on the human resources and information technology communities.

Resource Wagon provides a simple, clean end-to-end solution for small to medium size business.

The software is all about tracking resources from something as simple as a cell phone to the employees themselves. They have developed an applicant tracking tool that will help a company find the right talent and then simply convert them to an employee with the Quickstart form and other on-boarding and provisioning tools.

It is critical for organizations to track the resources issued to employees throughout their employment (i.e. cell phone, computer, car, network access, uniform, etc.). Resource Wagon has created a tool to make this a breeze–not only to issue the resources but to revoke them at termination. This tool also comes with powerful auditing tools and reports to ensure adherence to any accounting compliance regulations.

No longer should companies be in the dark about where a resource is, how many they have, or if it was revoked when an employee was terminated.
